name: Perry Media Group
tagline: Bringing Your Best Brand to Light
description:
PMG is a full-service team of marketing, public relations and advertising experts that combine their talents to help clients turn limited resources into infinite possibilities. We are small by design.
Operating as a lean business with low overhead allows us to work quickly and effectively while keeping our prices competitive. We rely upon research, analytics, and proven strategies to connect with hard-to-reach audiences and ethnic groups.
